name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess deep expertise in **.NET**, **C#**, **ASP.NET**, **Razor**, **SQL**, and RESTful APIs, enabling the development of scalable, high-performance web applications. Proficient in modern web technologies such as **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and XML, I excel in creating responsive and user-friendly interfaces that enhance the user experience. My strong acquisition of Agile methodologies ensures efficient team collaboration, while my problem-solving skills drive innovative solutions to complex challenges.

I bring a comprehensive background in full-stack development, leveraging frameworks like **React** and **Next.js**, and am acquainted with **GraphQL** for efficient data retrieval. My previous roles included mentoring junior developers and fostering collaboration within cross-functional teams. I also have substantial experience with compliance and security standards, having implemented applications under guidelines such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My ability to integrate technologies and work with diverse tech stacks positions me as a valuable asset for any team.
